memorycardtype: Compact Flash (Type I or II) x 2, UDMA
whitebalancing: White Balance Presets (12), Custom White Balance (5)
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Phase Detect, Multi-Area, Selective Single Point, Single, Continuous, Live View
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (1x), No. of Focus Points (51)
externalflash: Yes, Hot-shoe, Wireless plus sync connector
shootingmodes: Single frame shooting [S] mode, Continuous low shooting [CL] mode: 1-5 fps, Continuous high shooting [CH] mode: 5 fps (5-7 fps with DX format), Live view [LV] mode, Self-timer mode, Mirror-up mode
flashmodes: Auto, On, Off, Red-eye, Slow sync, Rear curtain
display: 3.0 inch Super Density TFT color LCD with wide-viewing angle
